attributes.action: Scrap the CSA\CMEC as it breaches a non resident fathers(NRP) human rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petiton if - 

1) You have been denied access to your children because the csa have delayed in reassessing you.

2) You have unfairly been put into arrears by csa delay.

3) You have been denied a legal right of appeal against unjust arrears due to CSA delay.

4) The resident parent has denied you access to your children so that her csa won't be reduced.

5) You are a NRP whose wife commited adultery but you're not allowed under law to pay money directly to your children instead you have to reward your ex wife for her adultery.

6) You have recieved threats of violence from the resident parents as a result csa delay.

7) Because of those threats you are now isolated from your children.

8) You feel that it is unjust that only the NRP should pay csa meaning the resident parent gets off paying.

9) You are a NRP who lives a long way from his children and feel that the CSA takes no account of the costs of keeping contact.

10) You feel that the CSA fails to take account of the emotional impact of divorce and that payments should not be between parents but from each parent for the child.

11)You feel that as a NRP you have a right that your children see that it is you that is paying for there clothes etc.
